ygData.subject: Re: specialization
ygData.msgSnippet: aha!!!! that s the answer i wanted! thank you =) so, my only question left is, how does specialization go up (i assume when you cast the spell, both the
ygData.messageBody:
aha!!!! that's the answer i wanted! thank you =) so, my only question left
is, how does specialization go up (i assume when you cast the spell, both
the discipline and the specialization go up?) and where can i learn
specialization?

Qorona Mindbender of the Volition Guild, 21st lvl enchanter on Cazic-Thule
>
>There is a separate skill in specialization for each spell discipline.
>Only one of your specialization skills may be over 50. Your normal
>spell skills are not affected. Thus specialization will help alll
>your skills, but only one specialization can truly excel.
>
>Does that make sense?
>
>Kaela
>
>------------------------------------------------------------------------
>Where do some of the Internet's largest email lists reside?
>http://www.onelist.com
>At ONElist - the most scalable and reliable service on the Internet.
>
>
